Choose how much you'd like to put into your EasyISA to see your charge.

table

Platform charge

This applies to Stocks and Shares ISA, personal portfolio and cash accounts. We pay 1.05% interest on any money you hold in cash.

+ Fund charge

This is the total cost of the fund each year.

= Total cost

Amount charged each year with no hidden or ongoing costs for an ISA invested in MyFolio Managed funds.

For your charge, you get all this

  • SLI experts managing their investment
  • Regular rebalancing to keep their funds on track
  • Free withdrawals
  • Live chat and phone support
  • 24/7 access to online account
  • Investments kept secure

With no charges for all of this

  • Transfering your old ISAs in
  • Paying cash in
  • Setting up your account (no initial charge)
  • Any changes to your account
  • Withdrawing your money
  • Trading or Broker fees (what is this?)
  • Auto dividend reinvestment (what is this?)
  • If your account is inactive
